item.description:
When was the last time you saw this movie?  I've found it interesting that there seem to be regional variations among the heckling and audience props.  What can I expect in Hartford?

 

Insomnia Theater occurs at 11:30pm on Friday and Saturday nights.  If it's a rainy night, so much the better for this film!  Tuxedo optional.

 

I have not been to Insomnia Theater, so I have no idea whether the shows sell out or if they are at the same discounted rate as Cinema Classics.  If you really need to know about the movie, go to the website and mouse over the poster:

http://www.bowtiecinemas.com/insomnia-theater-schedule-plaza.php

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Rocky Horror Picture Show" @ Insomnia Theater
